text: Cadre of the Communist Party of India (Marxist) staged an agitation in front of the Old police station in Mathur near here on Thursday. Led by Ramachandran, Mathur unit secretary of the party, they demanded issue of patta to the residents of Vivekananda Nagar near Mathur, grant of pension to the needy persons in and around Mathur and checking of anti-social activities in a few villages.
title: Agitation for patta
